# The `LegalityResult` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The legality outcome is represented by a class rather than an enum class because in some cases the legality checks are expensive and look for a particular instruction that can be passed along to the vectorizer to avoid repeating the same expensive computation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::sandboxir::LegalityResult</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The legality outcome is represented by a class rather than an enum class because in some cases the legality checks are expensive and look for a particular instruction that can be passed along to the vectorizer to avoid repeating the same expensive computation.

Definition at line 151 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/legality-h">Legality.h</a>.
